properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 15 at 8:09PM PST until January 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 15 to 19 feet.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for rough seas and consider remaining in port
until hazardous seas subside.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... ...STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
